lines.text: Yeah, we're walking and talking. And you're changed into a gnome.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Now I change. I change, because it only lasts a certain amount of time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Boy or girl?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm a boy.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: So are you Lord Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lord Scanlan of the Shorthalts.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Lord Scanlan, okay. Lord Scanlan of the-- I'm sorry, of the what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of the Shorthalts.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Of the Shorthalts. Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have a cobbling empire. Shoes.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: The Shorthalts. Okay. Lord Scanlan of the Shorthalts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everyone, but specifically because they're so underserved.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You have a gnome shoe empire?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rolling in it, baby.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Where's your empire, human?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I have no empire. I'm his valet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're wonderful partners, dear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I your wife?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to be? Is that weird?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I say it's equally-- no, it's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. So Coralin Shorthalt.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Thorbir is pulling on his beard and breathing deeply.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Now I cast Alter Self.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Cast and a flash of light. You guys all pick up the very, very heavy smell of breakfast ale emanating from the deeply breathing, angry dwarf.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wait, Vax. What was my role in this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're an advisor. A financial advisor.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Financial advisor. Excellent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It stands out like a sore thumb against the rest of the architecture, but it looks a night club. It looks very, very gaudy, but in a way that the garishness looks expensive, and so you can't really fault it for looking the way it does.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: It looks like cruise ship goth club.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I like that. I'll take that.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Cruise ship goth club.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: That's a thing that exists.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Really?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When are we going to this?

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Every year on the Jonathan Coulton Cruise, we gather in the cruise ship goth club.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: JoCo Cruise.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Too many jokes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has a very, very intense look about him. He's thicker. He's built like a barrel. He sits with his arms crossed, looking angrily out amongst the rest of the folks outside. To the other side, you recognize a burly-looking female with short hair and some facial tattoos. The Siren, who you saw battle in the Cauldron, apparently works as one of the bouncers of the Velvet Cabaret.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I approach right next to Vax, as we move up. Scanlan. In Draconic I go, greetings and salutations, friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives you a look of confusion for a second and leans forward and the dragonborn looks very intently at you and says back in Draconic, "Are you a member?"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We wish to inquire how to get inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks over to the Siren. Siren glances back and, "What's he saying?" And the dragonborn glances over. And he says out loud in Common now, at this point, "He's saying "that they're looking to come in here and talk to other elvish guys, I guess."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, not elvish, but more people of high society. High society here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. He gives a glance over. "Well, if you're not a member, you can acquire membership, but it "has to approved first by the owner."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: May we seek audience with him to ask or apply, or however that goes about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me get his assistant. Hold on just a second. Siren." She gives a look. "I'll be right back." She rolls up her sleeves and steps inside as the door opens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As I see her, I turn and face outward.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You know her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've been told that you're seeking possible membership to our establishment."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: In Dwarvish I say, that's correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, fantastic, then. Don't leave possible patrons outside." And looks off to the two bouncers and they grumble and step off to the side. "Come in. Come in. Follow me." And he steps inside. As you guys walk in behind him, immediately you're hit with the strong smell of exotic incense and the cooking of meat mingling with that. It has this smell of everything good you've ever smelled mixed into one location.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Love the smell of these places.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The interior is fairly low-lit with what looks like a series of faerie-fire lamps dangling in small lattice cages. So it has this light purplish-pink glow to the general interior. There are no stools or chairs. There are tables that low set and the floor is nearly covered with very, very expensive looking pillows. All the patrons are currently sitting cross-legged or laying around the tables. And you can see the clientele is very well dressed and very wealthy. There is laughter and conversation. There's definitely has a very, very different air. It's like stepping into a whole different world from what you're used to seeing in Vasselheim. And you get the feeling that whoever created this establishment definitely created it to provide a very different experience for most people who work here, which means one, it probably makes a really good killing to the small number of clientele, number two, it probably isn't very well liked by the people who have been living here most their life. As you look around, too, there are dice games being played, there are many gold pieces being stacked up on tables. It appears that there's definitely a lively-- what's the word I'm looking for? My brain isn't working-- gambling arrangement in this place. You notice that all the guards in the inside, the bouncers, are common sell-swords. There's no unification to their adornments or any of their armor and stuff. There are a few folks that are looking around, keeping the peace, arms crossed. They all definitely have weapons visible. And they're just sitting there, guarding just like the bouncers were at front of the place.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: How many dwarves?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just the one that let you inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I reach over and I grab Vax's hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I fold her arm in and walk forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I think, as they move forward, I would like to pull Thorbir aside and say, maybe since we're trying to get membership here, you should cover your runes.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Noted.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I'd like to make a perception check to size up the guards around. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that's a step in the right direction.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I rolled four times as good as I usually roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking about, they look armored. It's hard to tell their skill level, based on the low light in here. They seem definitely keeping an eye out, but you can tell they've been working here a while and they've grown comfortable. What you do notice, though, is a lot of the servers that are walking around are young men and women dressed in very fine silk robes or gowns. All have these iron bands around their neck, collars, that aren't chained to anything. But it immediately gives you this mental image of slavery or some sort of servitude. It does not appear that they are actually in some sort of servitude, but the adornment they wear is almost trying to get across that atmosphere, as if that's part of what you're paying for. It sickens you a little.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I'm going to carry myself and I'm going to do what I can to give off that I'm keeping an eye on this guy, that I'm the guy. That's how I'm trying to carry myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would to introduce myself. My name is Hosin. I "am the manager of this fine establishment, the Velvet Cabaret. I'd like to welcome you..."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan of the Shorthalts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Scanlan of the Shorthalts? Where do you hail from? I've not heard of them."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We come from Emon. I sell shoes. We sell shoes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, Coralin Shorthalt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Coralin Shorthalt."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, pleasure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Well, you have interest in membership you say?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We do. We're hoping to sample the atmosphere here. Is there entertainment? We heard there was great entertainment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's just plucking away. Her eyes are closed, like she's just caught in the moment. And there's group of people that are sitting around her chatting softly, not to be overbearing to the music, but to just be around that atmosphere.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Your wonderful employees mentioned membership. We'd like to acquire that as well, I assume, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're saying this to Hosin?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is Thorlaxalux, my financial advisor.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Thorlaxalux, at your service. I bow gracefully.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Deception roll.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What is that? 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? All right. "The pleasure is mine. And it's not often that come across elves that have taken the time to learn the tongue of my folk."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I know many languages.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's very well traveled. Very well cultured. That's part why we hired him.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I was a bit of a shut-in as a child. All I had were books on languages to read and whatnot, and adventures and what have you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, if you are seeking membership, you should probably speak with our patron, the owner "of this establishment. He's currently in a meeting, I believe, but step with me for a "moment." And he leads you to go to the other side of the room. And you know, all these draped orange and gold silks that are constantly getting in your way as you push through. Leads you into a doorway that is covered in these silks. You push into the hallway to the right and left. There's a door across the way, and two doors down the left. And the door at the very end is a really ornate-looking door with a series of locks that currently unlocked. Hosin walks up to it and knocks gently onto it, takes a listen. "Ah, it appears that he will be available in just a "moment, if you'd like to sit tight, and you're more than welcome to speak."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Question, Hosin. While we wait, do you happen to have any wine or ale? Just while we wait. It's been such a long travel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But of course."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. You're so kind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the servant, still averting his gaze from the guests, smiles, gives a little curtsy, and then darts back into the main room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cheers. Cling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cling and hand my glass to Thorbir.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take a sip of mine. It's very good.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: All right. I'm sipping to keep up the charade, but I'm not happy about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's definitely an elvish blend, which is generally too sweet for your tastes, but for what you were expecting, it's not too bad. Its serviceable. Nowhere near strong enough to really do anything, but it's not water.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Giant dwarven air quotes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome to the Velvet Cabaret."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look to Thorbir and then look in the room.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I step into the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The opposite side of the room has three large purple cushions on which there are two women, also servants, that are just lying back comfortably, just resting, and in the center, you see a man, very dark complexion, ratty looking, crimped dark hair, very well-trimmed beard and mustache ensemble, and long black and gold robes. Very, very long sleeves and jewelry adorning every ounce of his hands, his fingers, you can barely see the actual skin beneath, there is just so much jewelry adorning him. He looks up smiling with his elbows near the edge of the table. "Have a seat. We are "to talk, yes? Introduce yourselves. Guests are always welcome, but I wish to know who it is that "I am guesting for."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I seat Coralin and have a seat myself. And pretending to check out the women in the room, I make a perception check. And that is a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, what are trying to see?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, if anything sets off my alarm bells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They seem to be lounging. And there isn't like fear in their eyes or that they are being mistreated per se. Almost like they're here for atmosphere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the room itself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Membership does not come to anyone. We have "a certain level of clientele we wish to keep, because in keeping this it is easy enough for us to "consider it very-- how do I say?-- exquisite."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry, before we go on, what was your name? I don't believe I caught it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I did not catch your name either."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry, I am Coralin. Coralin Shorthalt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Coralin Shorthalt."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of the Emon Shorthalts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there is a slimy-ish presence, but not too aggressive. Just a very well-trained type of dealing with guests.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I subversively wipe it on my robes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My name is Vince Cyinnor. And I am the owner of this house of joy and pleasure."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm the lucky man who married her. My name is Scanlan of the Shorthalts. We're in from Emon, and reputation of this establishment is well known within all parts of the walls. We're looking to possibly become members here. We hear the entertainment is top-notch, and we hear that business happens within these walls. But I'm not convinced. I'm hoping to stay for an hour to see what you have to offer. When I find I like a place, I stay for a long time and leave a lot of money. I'd just like a little taste.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Using my last Luck of the day. That's better. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What, may I ask, business do you run that gives you the liquid assets to think that you can walk "and rub shoulders among such astute clientele? You are well-dressed, I see, and well-versed in "conversation. But have not heard of you before and I have very acute ears for people of such heritage "in this city."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We hail from Emon. We're not very flashy. We certainly don't do much in public in Emon. I prefer to make my money and enjoy my money and I don't believe in ostentation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why have you come to this establishment? I am made of ostentation, for I do not fear what "people judge or think here. Do what you like."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't get me wrong. I enjoy the form of a beautiful woman as much as the next man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why limit yourself?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who said I do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Even this one here, while his appearance may be rough, I'm certain that under certain "circumstances he could be persuaded to prove his weight in more than gold and weaponry."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mr. Cyinnor, I think it is best that you do not make presumptions on our relationship and dealings.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My wife and I are businessmen. And what we hear is that this is where business happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Business does happen here, yes. Quite a bit of interesting business."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we are very interested in all of those interesting businesses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "From what I hear, as my assistant has told me, your business is shoes. Tell me, why would the "business of shoes require such an ostentatious location for business?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The shoes are the public face, but the well runs deep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We get to the meat of the matter, eh? So, shoes is but an appearance. What is your business "aside from cobbling, Mr. Shorthalt?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know my way around poison, and I hear you have the rarest of breeds here. I have come to spend some money to satisfy my clients.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 15 again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 15 again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Poisons? So you supply to what? King-killers? Supply to sell-swords? You apply "them to your own weapons? You realize this city is very, very tight-knit when it comes to these sorts of "industries. Although I know you would think possibly to find it here, I guarantee you what we deal with "here has nothing to do with slitting of throats."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not looking to sell. I'm looking to buy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm interested in buying loyalty. I'm interested in buying trust. Since you've walked into this "room, there has been an air of something not right about you. And through this conversation, I have "come to believe that perhaps you're not telling me the truth. Now, I will ask of you this moment, "whoever you may be, Shorthalt or not, but this entire facility is very well paid to make sure "that should you try anything funny, you won't get but two steps before the heads leave your "shoulders. So let's be frank here. Who are you? Why are you here?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mr. Vince, let's not play coy. I am sure you have dealt with many a powerful client in your day. And I am sure that it is not unfamiliar to you that many powerful clients have many deep secrets.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As she finishes that, I dispel Alter Self.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As your actual dragonborn appearance restores itself, he sits back.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: My apologies. I am Tiberius Stormwind-- yes, wind.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I can never get it right.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I merely dispelled this to show you that earning your trust is in our best interests. I do not wish to deceive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then perhaps you should have walked in this form when you first arrived."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We're in a new town and it was standard protocol whenever we visit a new town. My apologies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, one person has come clean. What about this one? What is your business here?"

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: We're here, in the long run, to help you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What is to help me? You have not told me what your business is."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're here to stop a murderer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Explain."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bodies have been showing up outside this building. Multiple bodies. We're not going to get into the details, but we've been sent here to stop that from happening any further.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We're fairly sure you know of this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at this guy. Does he look like he's fucking around?

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: He winks at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The force of the wink itself is intense enough to the point where he physically shudders and leans back a few inches.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can't be a surprise to you. People are starting to take notice in this city. This was inevitable.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Do you still have Lord Tyrell's possessions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is about Lord Tyrell? We do have his possessions. They have been investigated. Our "establishment has already been investigated. The Bastions were very thorough, and we have been "found absolved of any sort of involvement."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are not Bastions. And we are not here to accuse. And we are not here to investigate your establishment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know what you're talking about. This is "ridiculous. And I may have to ask you to leave."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's shutting down. Someone do something quick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Insight check, insight check. Balls.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I will also make an insight check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do that, as well? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you get?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're all going to die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That makes my ten look titanic.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I'm trying to make you look good. It's what Thorbir does.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I rolled a two.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You're going up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not impressive. That's mythic.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Statistically unlikely.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That's the thing. You're beating math.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I've been beating math for 20 years. I'm very good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You're the singularity that ruins the universe.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Somewhere in the world there's a person who never rolls under 17. And I was placed on this planet to balance the math to save you all. To prevent the center of the planet from collapsing and taking us all with it. You're welcome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's in New Zealand. The other side of the Earth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, as you're all taking this moment to yourself. It's hard to read. It seems like he's very thorough and offended by this circumstance. You glean that there is a nervousness, and there are droplets of sweat across his brow. And his brusqeness does show a bit of fear in his eyes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you say there was candlelight? Or did you say there was weird indirect lighting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, indirect lighting. You don't quite know where the source is coming from. The door was already closed behind you. Hosin closed it. But as the wind comes out, all the silks blow against the wall. Pillows are lobbed to the sides. Both of the women in there (yelps) and pull back against walls, trying to keep out of the circumstance. And you can see Vince has begun to stand up and his hair blown back. "What is the meaning of this?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I sometimes get a little out of control. But remain calm! All right?! Jesus! Remain calm!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You calm down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry! I'm trying to remain calm, too!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Doing a great job.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you! Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Persuasion check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's in this room? It's the women--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the women and Vince. Hosin closed the door and left in the hallway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vince is the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Owner.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But is he human?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's human.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to approach him and I'm going to cast Mage Hand. I'm going to have it float right up in front of me. I'm like, now, you better start cooperating, because it seems to me that you're getting very nervous. And we don't want to do anything. Nor do we want to leave. All we want is information. I guess we want to know what you want to know, too. We want a lot of information. So start talking and stop acting like a fool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's sometimes hard to follow, but you don't want to fuck with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you do that, he glances about the room, looks over to you specifically, and back to the dragonborn, the dwarf.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I say, and whatever weapon you were about to brandish, you'd best wise to leave it be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You realize, you may have just alerted pretty much the entirety of my guard to this "establishment. They'll be descending on this room soon."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you realize that this is only because of your doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He sits down on the cushion again.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: And Thorbir looks at him and goes, okay. And pulls his greataxe out and leans on his greataxe.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I disperse the magic hand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are not with the Bastions.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: More calm.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Yes, still doing a great job with the calm, there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to remain calm, here. Okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you wish to know?"

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Once again, do you still have Lord Tyrell's possessions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "His possessions are not under my keeping, no."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: There we go. Thank you. Where are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no idea."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I want to do a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be insight, yeah.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: What's that like?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at you tense. He's fumbling lie after lie right now.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: It's just, you could easily tell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. For you especially, all the signs are there, the quivering to his voice, his eyes darting from person to person. He's still covering.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Okay, you're sitting in a room now with a whole bunch of people that want to hurt you. So it's obvious that you're lying. What do you know, or this guy and this guy are going to dragon and axe you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Look, what happened was unfortunate. There are things beyond your understanding or control "involved here."

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Oh, I don't know, we can understand a lot.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We fought a beholder before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do not take us for fools who just walked in here without a clue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk forward, I pull out Dagger of Venom and I drop a little bead of black down the blade and I hold it just about a centimeter under his neck. I've all run out of patience, friend. We're here to help this city and you're going to help us. Talk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check with advantage because of this whole setup here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dear god, so many. Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They'll kill me if I say anything."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: We're going to kill you now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now or later, friend.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And we could protect you from them. Or it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This establishment. I am not the owner. I am a figurehead. Something else currently pulls "the strings from behind."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Something else?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As we said, it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he looks off, past you, just over your shoulder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, son of a bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over your shoulder briefly and at this point you can see the door is partially ajar, and you can see in what little light there is a dwarven face staring through the passage that then slams the door shut quickly and you hear footsteps.

lines.name: MARISHA, WILL
lines.text: Was that Hosin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was Hosin, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking Hosin.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Thanks a lot, hoser!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's shaking his head now, the blade there, as you hear the feet running off now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's tiny and fast?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mouse, rat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going rat, and I'm going after Hosin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys watch as Keyleth all of a sudden grasps the side of her armor and then her form shrinks down to a tiny rat, then darts underneath.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to bap this guy in the head. I'm going to just flip the blade and strike him across the forehead.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As I see her do this, I open the scroll of Polymorph. I do Polymorph on myself, and I turn myself into a gadfly. And follow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, go ahead and roll for an attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so on a surprise, it's advantage. So 19's pretty good. I'll take the 19 over the two. So that's 19 plus-- 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, go ahead and roll sneak attack damage on that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, sneak attack damage. Is this a surprise because he didn't know it was coming?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is? So because of my assassinate feat, then this is a critical hit. So just the sneak attack damage? Okay, four, eight, ten, 12, 15, 21, 42.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With 42? Yeah, you (whack). He's out like a light. Lights off, face on a pillow. The two women squeal in reaction. You guys, as you rush under the door, what are you guys doing?

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I've been leaning over to see what he was reaching for.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you glance over you can see what appears to be a small jeweled blade that is hidden underneath one of the cushions there. It's a curved dagger that comes to a gradual point.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I'm going to take that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So mark down jeweled dagger in your equipment.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I want to search him. I want to see if he has anything on him, in his pockets, anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you are beginning to go through his body, you guys have rushed beneath, and as you can see, the dwarf, Hosin, is walking down the hallway really quickly with his robes open.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As a gadfly, can I really quickly buzz in front of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see him, he's about 15 feet away, and as he's walking, he's looking about very nervously. He's seen one of the guards is approaching, and he looks back over and sees the rat scurrying down the hallway.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How far away is he from me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's about 20 feet.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How far away is the guard in front of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what, let me go ahead and pull this up. It'll give a good indicator of the circumstance here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He does what?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh god, we have a map.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gentlemen, we need to move.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, so he's right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mama Cass, what have you found?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys are currently inspecting him at the moment, as you guys are rushing through.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh! So I'm within 20 feet of him, whatever?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually no, he'd be back here. He's just rushing past. So he's 20 to 25 feet from you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay. Ah. I'm going to dispel Polymorph, and I'm going to cast Silence in front of him. I'm going to silence him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, so you're using him as the source?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level spell is that? 2nd-level?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes. I believe so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frustrated, he continues to run. I'm going to have you guys roll initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking shit. 17.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sorry. What is that? 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 and 17. All right. So you guys will both be going first, but before we finish that, as you guys are searching the body you hear all of a sudden the sound of some sort of scuffle, a flash of some sort of energy in the hallway that's muffled between the doorway, and footsteps also happening. As you're just starting to get through his pockets you start hearing some sort of a scuffle outside of the room.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I'm gone.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Me, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I'll have you guys roll initiative, as well.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not great. Nine.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I've done it in my life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as you guys are turning, we'll get to your turn in a moment. Tiberius and Keyleth, you're up first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we at the same time? I guess I'll go ahead and cast out of my beast shape as well and cast Hold Person on him as he's running away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Cool. Just staying where you are? Are you going to stay there or are you going to move?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, he's right there, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I'm just going to try and hold him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the spell releases, you can see the mystical shimmering cage that seems to encapsulate, seems to shrug it off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goddamn it. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to move or are you staying where you are?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll follow after his ass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Tiberius?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to cast Telekinesis and grab him that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So from where you are you go ahead and you create your telekinetic force, you rush out, and the telekinetic force seems to have no effect on the dwarf's form.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's the rakshasa! That's him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you move?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No. I yell at you, don't chase him!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I go, what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which you don't hear, because she goes [no audio].

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm in the silent bubble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there is currently no sound coming from the center of that area.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: But she can hear me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She can hear you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I'm not that far. You heard me, the other way! The other way! And I move in the room with these guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you guys turn, you see Tiberius come rushing into the room.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The rakshasa! Nothing works on him! And I think that's not normal!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're speaking Draconian!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, sorry! Rakshasa. I believe the dwarf is the rakshasa. I cast many things, and Keyleth is in there, nothing hit him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You left her with him? I shove past him and go straight through the door.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: You ran away from the target? Ugh. I stomp past him in my dwarfy stomps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hosin gets just out of the sphere of silence and then angrily does a motion with a hand and then-- (shouting)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I knew it was going to happen!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kashaw. What do you want to do?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I want to go back eight moves and catch the thing. I think what we're going to have to do now is find out where he is. Let's Locate Creature again, if we can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, this is during your turn. Is there anything you want to do?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Can we locate creature, see how close he is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How long does it take to cast Locate Creature?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I believe it is one action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you can do that, so you mark that off as another casting of that spell.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you rush out into the hallway and see that it's vanishing, you cast the spell for a second, you can see the direction of the creature is roughly ahead of you and you also see a door on the opposite side, this right-hand door open and close.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He goes invisible? He's not teleporting, he's just invisible. That's a big thing.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Yeah, he's here. He's still here. We can't see him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have 15 feet of movement, if you want to move forward.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Yeah, I would like to move forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you'll get up to that point with your turn. And you gather that that's the direction of him, and that you know that's where it's going.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I know where it's going, okay. So we saw the door shut. That's where he is, let's go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't run blindly in there, hold on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to run just up past Keyleth, I'm going to look at her as I pass. Not bad. Keep going, stop there, and now I'm going to try to sense traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, there? Okay, so you can get up to here if you're going to use an action as well to dash.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I use, that's fine, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you go to talk to her no words come out.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Can I see what's going on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone darted out and you're making your way out. So go ahead and make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This hallway is fairly often-traversed by the clientele of this establishment, and nothing seems dangerous. That would be difficult to put in the middle of a place and still run a business.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I look at Kash and Keyleth and say-- Are we out of initiative? We're still in initiative.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're still in initiative. Currently, for the moment, just for the sake of the pacing on this.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I'm going as far as I can down the hall toward the direction of the bad guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to the top of the round, Tiberius, you're up.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Where'd you say the guards came from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They came from the main room, where the silks are that separate the hallway from the main area. And you start hearing people shouting and some slight yelps and screams from the other room.People who seem freaked out by the sudden rise in energy.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What was that guy's name? Lohan?

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Hosin?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hosin?

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: The dwarf is Hosin. The other guy is Vince.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I just disperse Silence, and before I go out, I turn into Hosin. Alter Self.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you use your action to cast Alter Self. You take Hosin's form, step out, closing the door behind you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How did he sound, again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How did he sound?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I don't remember.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's a dwarf.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: He was Scottish, but fancy Scottish.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's glam rock. Glam rock.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, right, right. What's all this noise out here? What are you bothering my friends for? Guards!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards look over confused and, "We heard there was a--"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Everything's fine. These are friends. Get on with your business. Get back on patrol. Make sure nothing happens or I'll have your heads.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, come on, Tiberius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards look at each other. "All right, but if anything happens again, there's a problem, "let us know. We'll be at the ready." They sheathe their weapons and look untrustingly to the rest of your group with your weapons currently drawn and step back--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Go on, get out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They disappear back into the main room and they start calming down some of the other patrons who are starting to peek around them, trying to see what's going on, the action. Some look smiling and curious to see what's happening, and they're, "Go back to your tables. It's fine; there's no "problem." And they disperse the energy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not bad, Tiberius.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With that, I continue with the charade and loop my arm around Vax and say, shall we go into that room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a moment, dear. Pull out the same poisoned blade and start walking down that hall a little further, and I want to see if I sense any traps further ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, to about there? Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: And balance was restored to the universe. Oh god, don't do that! Come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Put it away. Watch as the dice just like turns to dust.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: It's the end of Raiders.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. You glance about the room as you're walking forward carefully, looking at the floorboards, looking at the tapestries on the walls, looking for anything that would be out of sorts, and your eyes very keen to find anything out of the ordinary. The room thankfully does not appear to have anything specifically trapped. It seems fairly safe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. Okay. And those are doors up there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Door to the right, door to the left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would that check include the doors themselves?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say with a natural 20, yes. The doors both also seem to be functional doors, not designed with any sort of trap attached.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Pressing my ear to the door on my left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Listen to it. Perception roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So many. Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seems fairly quiet.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: If we've stopped pursuing, does that take us out of initiative?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are not, you guys are not currently in initiative because you're not in the thick of battle. You managed to disperse the conflict.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to do it at the other door as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you step to the other door. You guys want to do anything else while you're waiting on him?

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I'm just going to come, I want to get as close to him as I can and I'm ready for a fight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I follow.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Thorbir. Do you have an extra sword or arm on you? Perhaps a shortsword?

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I give him the jeweled dagger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That one's a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19? Listening, you hear what sounds like a slight (creak) sound, some sort of a scooting of wood on wood, and then silence.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kick in the door. Hard as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a strength roll. This would be straight strength.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, that's the wrong guy. 12. 14.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As he's doing that, I'm going to drink a potion of frost giant strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You slam your foot into the door. Oh, that was the foot that you just got healed. Oh, that's going to bruise. That's really going to bruise.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth-- Coralin, darling, could you come up here please?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes? Did you stub your toe, darling?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I think I want to get this door open quickly, please.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I'm going to hit the door with my axe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go for it and roll. What did you roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A one!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No way! It's a lie. If it wasn't live, no one would believe it.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I rolled a one. Because it is what I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to test this theory. I'm going to trade you, for now, and I'm going to leave you with that dice and see if it has any impact whatsoever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frodo!

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: The curse doesn't care about which die is rolled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is very possible, but there needs to be--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is like science class.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe it's because that dice was in the vicinity of Matt's hair, you'll be good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: So how much damage do I take for some reason?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you pull back the axe, you actually swing wildly backward, nearly hitting Vax in the process. You have to dodge out of the way as the axe embeds itself into the wood behind you.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Ugh. Again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Axe is stuck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pull out thieves' pick and start on the lock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you unclasp. As you do, you feel your throat seize suddenly as the cold liquid tends to freeze up what is normally a very warm and very fire-breeding interior to your throat. And it thaws slowly, and as you exhale you can see the mist, and suddenly your muscles pulse with energy and you feel like your physical form is embodied strength far more than you've ever felt in your body before.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: With his jeweled dagger, I take out my dagger. I feel great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The freshmaker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's now the angriest dwarf right now clutching two daggers as you get down with your thieves' tools.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, let's try to leave the room. That's better. That's a 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The door swings open without issue. It's one of the easier jobs you've had.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I should've done that in the first place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! Should've beat it down and then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a small table on the side where there are some books stacked up. There's a dresser on the far end that's closed. There is a canopy bed set up. There is a small end-table on the side. And the rest of the room has a nice circular rug that's thrown across the center, and there are no windows currently to this room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I turn my head to everyone and just mouth the words-- and perception check the room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I perception check, as well?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I just look to see, I want to just meditate and-- what did you just roll? 24?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to see if I see any movements or brushes of cloth or anything like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 19. Not as good as Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: How long does it take me to pull the axe out of the wall, and how far into Yakety Sax does the soundtrack get while I'm up there and with the foot and then I'm jumping on it and trying to pull it down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're currently hitting the one minute 15 second mark. Haven't quite pulled it out of the wood yet.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Okay, good. And my little legs are kicking underneath me while I pull it down, cursing in Dwarven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They call me Benny. Benny Hill.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you wish to enter the room?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I don't, actually. Because of all the sound, I wish to turn my back to the room and guard the hallway while everybody else is inside checking out the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is the rug, and most everything else in here seems to be perfectly still. You catch what looks like a little bit of movement of the canopy bed, the material that's on top. There's a slight sway to it that comes to stillness you just barely catch with your keen half-elven eye.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Both hands. Clicking the Boots of Haste.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (bam) Click the Boots of Haste, you run and charge up into the bed and stab upward into the canopy. The material is torn asunder, this very fine, probably imported silk is carved into three separate ribbons and falls gently onto the cushion of the bed proper, revealing the hardwood ceiling above you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to check the ceiling. There's a lot of perception. I'm all out of Luck. That's no good. That's a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14, looking about, it's solid wood, you can move your fingers along and you're standing on the bed, you can just get it within reach, and feeling along the board, it's all pretty solid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to make myself soccer field goalie this stuff with the door, in the door frame, just really trying to see if I can see any brush of dust or movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Keeping an eye out. You pull your axe free. Into the hallway door in front of you. Not a lot of strength. You pull it out and try the best you can to save some grace.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Well done. Yeah, that was graceful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I motion Tiberius over.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Should I do a perception on that? Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ceiling looks pretty solid.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Can I turn, saving my back to the door, I turn over. I do a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. You step over, you glance past Keyleth.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Oh my god, one.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Stop trying to steal my thing, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over and you're more distracted by the fact that Keyleth is doing this awkward field goal thing in the door to you for no reason, and you forget what you were in the middle of doing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to make myself big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There appears to be no exit from the ceiling.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Can I enter the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may. You push past the confused cleric.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Okay, so I look around. I look at the rug. I sigh heavily. And I pull the rug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plain slats.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You thought that was going to be good!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: With a point, too!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were never a fan of elves or half-elves before, but this one's really starting to dig into you a little.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I'll make a perception check because we could total up all my rolls and I'd have five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on. Hey!

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Look at that. That's actually better. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20. You pull the rug back. There's nothing there, and you look about at the rest of the folks with a heavy sigh. But the rug was on the right track. Everyone was keeping high. Looking beneath the bed, you can see what looks to be, in the shadow, some little bit of elevated wood that catches your attention.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I just, under the bed!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh! I'll motion over there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're not silenced, right? So I'm yanking off any fancy clothes I have on and I'm pulling my Cloak of Elvenkind out. I'm putting it over. And I spider under the bed and check it for traps.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pick up his clothes and I put them in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Oh my god, she's folding the clothes. We're in the middle of this, and she's folding the clothes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They might come in handy later.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 25 for looking for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Well, it's a good thing you rolled high enough perception, because as you spider underneath, your first hand goes underneath and you nearly tumble and you catch yourself. There is a five-foot-wide hole in the ground right beneath this bed. And as you catch yourself, you can feel a little bit of wind slowly drifting up from underneath. There's some sort of airflow coming up from underneath this bed where this hole is, and you feel over and you can see that little bit of wood that you saw looking forward is the top of a makeshift ladder that is currently fastened to the side of this tunnel that disappears beneath the room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there dim light down there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is pitch black. You can see with the dim light from your low-light vision a little ways into it, about 20 or so feet from the angle you're at, because you're not looking directly in. And even just glancing over the side it continues down for quite a while.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: And it's big enough to fit all of us if we wanted to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Independently, yes. One person would go down. It would be single file, of course, because it's a tight tunnel.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Only one way to go, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can see in pitch black, right?

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I have darkvision, 60 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that dim or dark?

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Dark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Darkvision, you can see within a short distance of pitch black and then a larger distance at low light, so yeah.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I'll go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So we'll put in order here, who's going down next? All right. And after Vax?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll follow my husband.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth. That's weird. Tiberius?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I cast that right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As your form shimmers for a second and you see-- you notice this too, Kashaw-- his scales almost seem to protrude into earthy spikes and then form and solidify, almost like his body becomes its own suit of armor.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Okay, that's cool.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Even though I'm still a dwarf, though.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I'm going to go, but I'm going to cast Freedom of Movement on myself before I go down there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you do, even with the encumbrance of the armor you're wearing, you feel like your form is a little more agile and you're ready for anything that might try and stop your passage. You guys begin making your way down, with Thorbir leading the way. You descend for a good three to four minutes, you gather probably a hundred feet or more down, rung by rung, and there are a few that you reach that are a little rickety. About a hundred feet down, one hits your foot and snaps, but you manage to catch yourself on it, but you get the feeling this ladder is probably not meant to hold someone of your heavy physical form.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Largesse?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Largesse, you could use, yes. One by one, you make your way down until eventually you're, you begin to see towards the edge of your darkvision, floor finally begins to appear and rise towards you. You step off the ladder into what appears to be a small circular area that leads into another ten-foot-by-ten-foot tunnel, ten by 15 foot up, and continues forward. This is very natural carved earth, it's not smoothed stone, it just looks like a tunnel that was mined out of the floor.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Is it still dark?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you all eventually make your way down.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Is there anything loose down there that I can grab a hold of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't see anything. Mr. Human, you are in pitch-black darkness.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Well, that's why I'm wondering if I feel around underneath me to try to find some kind-- do I find a loose stone? Do I find a pebble? Can I find anything to grab?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reach down, yeah, you manage to find a couple of small stones.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As he's milling about, Light.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That's what I was going to do, but he beat me to it. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you reach down and you find a stone, you pick it up, you begrudgingly grab your holy symbol, and as you begin to recite your cantrip incantation, a flash of white light comes gleaming off the top of the dragonborn sorcerer's staff.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Dagger. Because I have two daggers in my hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. One of the daggers is now glowing. The jeweled one, twice as pretty when it's emanating torchlight.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Nice. Thanks for the warning, by the way.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sorry, I usually just do it when it's dark.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: This tunnel goes in just one direction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One direction.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I'm walking down the tunnel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So we'll say for the sake of marching order, who all is going in after Thorbir? In what order?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I'll go next.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Following Thorbir.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll go behind Kash.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I don't need this at all, but I just wanted to play with it. That's me right there.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll follow. I'll keep on Thorbir's six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll stay 15 feet behind him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 feet behind? All right. And Keyleth, you continue up that way. All right, so that'll be the marching order.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: So I've got my axe out. And may I make a perception check to see what I see? To just see if I can pick up footprints or motion or whatever?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be more tracking, if you're looking for footprints, so that'd be wisdom.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Okay. Just a straight wisdom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Survival.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Survival, hang on. Not my system. Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight? Okay. It's hard to tell. It looks like this area is not heavily traversed, and what little sign of footprints there are scattered enough that it's hard to make out a specific print. But I mean, they have been traveled before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm looking over Thorbir's head and looking for traps as he walks from behind. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22? All right. As you guys are walking forward and going through this, you get about 40 feet forward before you catch that there is a slight divot, a small drop in the dirt, and one looks like a section of intentionally placed plate of some kind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait a tick. I'm going to go up to the edge of it and try to inspect it and see if I can find a trigger or see how it works. Six. And that is, what is that, perception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you checking to see how it works?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to see if I can disarm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To disarm it. Okay, that would be with your thieves' tools. So this would be a dexterity plus your thieves' tools, so plus seven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19? Okay. As you go to the plate, you stop and look up at the walls to the side, and to each side of the wall you can see these tiny little holes, these little quarter-sized, gold-piece-sized tunnels bored multiple places on both sides of this wall. And you take the plate, you realize this is a pressure plate-based trap, and taking one dagger, you slightly lift it. The second one, you eventually find beneath where the trigger apparatus is, and you gingerly cut each part of these spring-loaded triggers until eventually the plate rises more and more and more and you remove the last bit, the plate tips over, and the trap itself is disarmed.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Nice work.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I mean, well done, rogue.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: So I keep going down. I want to hit a thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: That's not a wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is that. All right. Pushing forward, continuing for another 30-40 feet, do you want to check traps again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Again. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? Okay. Pushing forward for a period of time, there doesn't appear to be any change. There are no more divots. You're keeping a very close eye for the traps. And as you're walking forward with your axe. As you're stepping forward you get this weird tickle across your nose, like a spider web of some kind that catches you, and you instinctively reach up and brush it away from your nose. As your finger presses against it, it's much sturdier than a spider web. It's a metallic wire, and as you push away (tink). You hear that slight noise. Tiberius, behind you, you hear a grinding of stone, and a loud slam sounds, like something extremely heavy just dropped behind you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Run!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys glance over your shoulder and you see what looks to be a fairly rounded boulder--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I dispel Alter Self immediately so I have longer-ass legs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that. But that only carries it for a few rounds. It's been a longer time than that.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Never mind. I don't do shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But yeah, don't worry about that. But the stone boulder just--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Indiana Jones, motherfuckers!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Picking up speed with the slow decline of this room. All of you guys, what are you doing?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Run!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're bolting forward.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I cast Fly on myself and fly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cast Fly, pushing forward, and you guys get a little speed, but you've noticed the boulder's started to gather steam as it continues down, and the pathway you guys are running is going at a heavier and heavier decline as you push forward.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh! As I'm flying, I turn around with my ring and I cast Slow on the boulder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is interesting. Let me see if Slow would have a direct effect on this boulder. That's something that happens right now that I didn't consider. I love when that happens. Unfortunately, it is not a creature and actually it affects the physical metabolism and muscle use of an individual. This is just a solid structured object. As you release the spell, you see the air around it poof, and drift a little slower, and the boulder seems to stutter for a moment, but continues to push forward. That was your action.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to cast all of my spells in succession for the next ten minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I assume you're going full sprint? Okay, so pushing forward, you all push forward, Tiberius who has stopped to turn around and cast the spell is not at a full dash, so he trails behind. The boulder is currently gaining on Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I Gandalf it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius, the boulder is nearly upon you now. What are you going to do?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh! Awesome. Is it at least ten to 15 feet away from me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is about ten to five feet away from you, you can see it cresting--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sweet. As I'm now frustrated, I cast a 5th-level spell, and I will cast my Obelisk of Iron, three in a row behind me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. You burned that spell. All of a sudden, the room behind you, out of the stone, pockets of iron ore or whatever material is beneath the earth behind you is brought together into a liquid mass and then shoots up in the center of the hallway behind you. With each one of these pillars slamming into the wall, you guys hear these three multiple explosions behind you, and for a brief second you fear the worst for Tiberius' current status. Immediately following that, you hear the impact of stone against iron, and you see the obelisks bend with this horrible creaking sound.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keep running!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That should stop it right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sound of the rolling has stopped.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still don't trust it. Let's just all get out of this hole.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I keep Gandalfing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It could give way at any moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's walk. Shall we walk? I think we should walk.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I like to walk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys continue moving forward, the decline getting a little more difficult to traverse as your feel yourselves now having to feel your arms across the wall or use it for balance to make sure you don't just fall. Also, the moisture in the air begins to grow more and more thick. Some source of liquid some point down in the future has permeated what was originally dusty, dry air with liquid of some kind, and the air itself grows more and more rancid in scent. It smells like refuse or rot. It's hard to describe, and it's old. It's musky, it's terrible, and it grows stronger the farther you go. As you continue pushing forward, you also feel that the dusty ground is becoming more and more mud-like.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Is it making my hair poof out and look stupid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little bit, yeah. You spent all morning treating it and it's undoing everything you did.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: This is why I lived in the mountains.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Is there any light? Any light source? There's no natural light? We're not walking towards any type of light?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just a tunnel into darkness right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does there appear to be any type of plant life?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can tell, there is no plant life at all whatsoever. The moisture gathered on the walls you can now see are dripping. The condensation has given this tunnel more of a mineral-pocketed look, and the ground is getting more sludgy with each step.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I want to make a-- I'm sorry, you're not done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was just going to ask: are the walls stone or chiseled-out rock?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It feels like it's chiseled-out, hard earth that has been packed and supported with either small wooden things that are inset to make sure it doesn't collapse at some point, a lot of that has either fallen through.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: So it could collapse at any time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, if you do any severe damage to its structure. It would probably be a bad idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, like drop a boulder down it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a mine shaft.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What were you going to say?

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I would like to make a-- you tell me what check it is. What I want to do is to look down into this thick mud stuff. What I'm looking for are tracks, and if I do well enough, I want to see if I can get a sense of how fast the thing was going. Has it slowed down because it's comfortable, or is it still running?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make another survival check.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: So I'm underground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, as a dwarf I'll give you advantage on that, so roll again. That makes sense, this is your place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, the higher one was four. The lower one was a one.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: The higher one was a four?

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Remember what I told you about the Wheaton dice curse? I'm sorry. Because no one will believe me. No one ever believes me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's been taking pictures of all his fails so everyone believes it.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: At this point, I'd be amazed that he hasn't helped us in any way, shape, or form, and cast a perception check of my own.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: There we go. So let's see, we are at 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21, okay.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You are useless. For the love of god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a pre-existing member of the Slayer's Take and the man who was currently set to be the leader of your group, you're beginning to wonder if this guild is the kind of thing you really want to be joining, at this point.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I haven't been in a fight yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: True. But looking down you can see there are no tracks, actually. This line has not been traversed in quite some time, and the smoothness of it says that whatever came through here did not leave any footprints.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: At all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Also, as you guys continue, you reach a point where, especially with your heavy armor-- go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got this.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Ten. So wait. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? Okay. You're stepping forward, keeping an eye out, and you look back at the group and take a step and your foot slips out from under you. (smack) You hit the slime and begin to slide down the tunnel as part of the decline. You guys watch as your cleric Goonies-style slide vanishes into the darkness.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: It's our time. It's our time down here.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Hey, you guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kashaw has vanished into the darkness and you hear, (screams).

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As I see this happening, I run over and go like, this looks like a lot of fun!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you lunge through the air, because you're flying, still.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh. Has ten minutes passed? I thought ten minutes? It only lasts for like ten minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, then yeah, it's faded. So you just slide after?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I go and I slide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius slides after, body first across the slime.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I see Tiberius go and I go, (whoops). And I go, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Three of your party have just vanished into the darkness, hoping that fate will take them to some place of pillows and feathers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think I'd rather walk as long as I can.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I think I'm with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys both make dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wow. You manage to slowly make your way down this tunnel, almost-- what's that?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: My dex was 18, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't matter; you jumped into this. You intentionally fell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can't even hear you anymore. You're miles away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's this terrible continuously growing scent.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I put up my nose scales.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Until eventually, out of the darkness, because you're ahead of everyone, you're outside of the range of his Light spell, the slime stops and there's just air.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, you guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a few moments of this air rushing past you as you're immediately stopped with a wet sound as you impact hard into some sort of heavy spongy matter. Thankfully, because it's spongy, you only suffer four points of damage, so you can mark that somewhere on the sheet. Mainly just from the way you landed and your armor sticks into where the plates are and just the impact was bad for your body. But you're now in darkness, looking up, sitting on what feels like you're on some sort of strange compost heap. Looking up, you see in the darkness this small light begin to appear, and you see this dragonborn--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm laughing, by the way.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Can I try to move, since I hear him laughing, can I try to move out of the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You roll out of the way as the two of you scream down. With the light that now shines you can see this is a cylindrical cistern of some kind. It is a tunnel that is very tall, and you both impact into the same heap.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shitter's full!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As we land, I look around. Oh, that was a lot of fun. I cast Prestidigitation three times in a row and clean us all up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You try and clean what you can, but you guys are like knee to nearly waist deep as you get up and move around--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Or at least our faces.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your faces are clean.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: What a wonderful smell you've discovered.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it's a terrible smell. This room is quite honestly a mixture of long-rotting food, of dried vegetation that has been discarded here for whatever reason, a lot of it's hay and thatch that has been just rotting and molding for god knows how many years, and quite honestly, feces from some indeterminate entity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I use my Druidcraft to take out some of my sage and light it and spread some of my sage around.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You're making it worse. Now it's smoky and smells. Prestidigitate it out of my face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear this, and as you look around with the light you can see little bits of movement leaping through this heap.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rat horde.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Rats are going to be wonderful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then suddenly, thrusting out of some of this heap, you see a large arm or tendril, brownish-tan in color just slams onto the side of it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh shit. I go invisible.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You've got to help-- where the hell did he go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point you now see emerging from it two of these giant tendrils, which at the end are covered in these long, teeth-like spines, grasping the sides of this stone cylinder, pulling itself out of the refuse, shaking as it pulls itself forward. You now see the body that contains it with one third central tendril that rises up, what looks like creepy eyes or nose-holes that are looking around and glancing at both of you, and you see emerging beneath that the body, this large, eight- to ten-foot-thick, wide, covered-in-slime body that is this gargantuan toothy maw that opens up with a tongue that lolls out. And that's where we're going to go ahead and end today's session. We'll pick it up next week right where we left off. You guys slowly making your way down the tunnel. We'll pick up with that next time.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Toothy maw is where we end it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Toothy maw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tentacley, brown, twitchy eyeball, toothy maw. That's all we know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all you know. And some sort of strange sound and other small things moving.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Do you give out prizes for the most ones rolled in a night, because I'm pretty sure I won that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I do, and for that prize I give you a fancy yellow d20.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Oh! Thank you. That's great. Does it have all ones on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shit. Yeah. How did that happen?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's been your problem the whole time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Congratulations, you've won imploding self-esteem.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: That stacks, right? I already have that. I mean, it would be silly if I couldn't-- is that an ongoing? Because that's a feat I took when I started.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, I tried to tell you not to take that but, you know, character flavor is important.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Listen, it's a class feature. It's an actor's class feature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: After enough time, you can suck people into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, guys, thank you so much!

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Thanks, Matt. That was amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a fun first round. Got one more session with you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, and what did you think of your first game?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Yeah. Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well guys, thank you, I'm so glad you could join us and I'm excited for next week. And thank you guys for tuning in, hope you're enjoying it as much as we are. We can't stay too long, unfortunately, I have a flight to catch very soon to fly out to a convention in Columbus, Ohio. Zac, I think, is around here with whatever we got in business we've got to get down to with all you awesome people. Thank-yous.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We'll save gifts for next week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see, we got here--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Start 813.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's amazing that you keep donating, I really appreciate that. Dafeedthedargenzeen--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: There might be more there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much for all your donations.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, all this and again, thank you for doing this because portions of this goes to an amazing charity and we love all the people at 826.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But yes, they're a great charity, so yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Give to them the hefty amount that you guys have contributed over this time towards their charity. It's fascinating.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You guys have incredible fans. This whole week leading up to this on Twitter and everything, you guys have amazing fans.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now you guys get the fanart!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Sorry about what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry about the DDOS attack. That's how we say hi.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: No, seriously, it's amazing.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Don't even mention things like that. Don't mention those things.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: It's more of a hug.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: They've already started a stupid e-mail chain talking about what musical songs they're going to sing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So she did return.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's back!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: And a special guest.

lines.name: STEVE
lines.text: I'm just going to troll. Hi.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Steven Blum, everybody.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Starscream himself is here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, he is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much for coming to watch, I hope you enjoyed yourselves. Yeah, it's an incredible time, looking forward to the session next week. Are there any other closing comments you guys want to bust out tonight?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to wait a week.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: Really fun and really weird to be on this side of that screen. So odd for me, and just to play a character who's so different from the characters I used to play before I DMed all the time. It's weird to be a guy who just doesn't think about stuff and like is not particularly charismatic and anyway, people who have thought about playing or want to play RPGs, when we were rolling up this guy, I was so excited when I got-- what did I roll for him? Anyway he's got a minus one. I rolled an eight for his charisma, and I was so excited because I was like, well now I know exactly who this guy is. I know exactly who he is and it's going to be really fun to be him. It was really great, it was really fun to come and I found out about your game because Liam directed me in a voice session. I want to be on your show so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then we smash them.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Now roll a one and get us out of here.

lines.name: WIL
lines.text: I'll try, but since it's not going to count, I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thanks so much. We'll see you next week, 7PM on the Twitch stream. Have a wonderful week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bye!
